娒字的基本解释

娒
wǔ
古同“侮”，轻慢；欺负。

娒
mǔ
古同“姆”，指古代教育未婚女子的妇人。

娒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǔ］
［《集韻》滿補切，上姥，明。］
同“姆1”。
对中年妇女的称呼。
[②]［wǔ］
［《集韻》罔甫切，上噳，微。］
通“侮1”。
凌辱；轻慢。

娒字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　娒； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页262第08
【集韻】同姆。女師也。　又與侮同。【前漢·張良傳】上所不能致者四人，皆以上嫚娒士，故逃匿山中。　本作娒。娒字从女从?。

娒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
娒字的起名意思

暂无。

娒
Basic explanation of words
娒
wǔ
Gu Tong "insulted", contemptuous; bullied.
娒
mǔ
In ancient times, the "mu" refers to the woman who educates unmarried women in ancient times.
娒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǔ]
["Jiyun" full complement cut, grandma, Ming. ]
Same as "M1".
The name given to middle-aged women.
[②]［wǔ］
["Jiyun" cut, up and down, micro. ]
Pass "Insult 1".
Insult; contemptuous.
娒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　娒; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 262 08
【Jiyun】Tongmu. Female teacher also.　The same as insult again. [Previous Han·Zhang Liang Biography] The four people who could not be caused by the above were all above the men, so they fled into the mountains.　This is a 娒. What is the word from the female?.
娒
